properties.name: environment
properties.description: Indicates if environment is 'dev' or 'pro'. For instance, in 'dev' environment, OTP is not checked.

properties.name: internet.url
properties.description: The internet URL. Used to build registration links.

properties.name: server.internal-http-port
properties.description: Internal (behind balancer) http port, typically 8080.

properties.name: server.internal-https-port
properties.description: Internal (behind balancer) https port, typically 8443.

properties.name: server.external-http-port
properties.description: External (public IP) http port, typically 80.

properties.name: server.external-https-port
properties.description: External (public IP) https port, typically 443.

properties.name: server.strict-transport-security-header
properties.description: Value for the Strict-Transport-Security header.

properties.name: server.expect-ct-header
properties.description: Value for the Expect-CT header.

properties.name: server.content-security-policy-header
properties.description: Value for the Content-Security-Policy header.

properties.name: server.cache-control-cacheable-header
properties.description: Value for the Cache-Control header for cacheable responses.

properties.name: server.cache-control-non-cacheable-header
properties.description: Value for the Cache-Control header for non-cacheable responses.

properties.name: server.frame-options-header
properties.description: Value for the X-Frame-Options header.

properties.name: server.xss-protection-header
properties.description: Value for the X-XSS-Protection header.

properties.name: server.content-type-options-header
properties.description: Value for the X-Content-Type-Options header.

properties.name: server.referrer-policy-header
properties.description: Value for the Referrer-Policy header.

properties.name: server.feature-policy-header
properties.description: Value for the Feature-Policy header.

properties.name: server.ssl.ecdh-curves
properties.description: TLS ECDH offered curves.

properties.name: server.ssl.enable-ocsp-stapling
properties.description: Enable TLS OCSP stapling.

properties.name: spring.mvc.favicon.enabled
properties.description: Enable spring default favicon.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.value-base64
properties.description: Set if the Base64 encoding of session cookie value should be used. This is valuable inorder to support RFC 6265 whichrecommends using Base 64 encoding to the cookie value.

properties.name: server.servlet.session.cookie.same-site
properties.description: Set the value for the SameSite session cookie directive. The default value is Lax.

properties.name: security-parameters.registration-ttl
properties.description: Security Parameter: Time to live of a registration before it expires.

properties.name: security-parameters.registration-min-ttl
properties.description: Security Parameter: Minimum time to live of a registration before another one can be requested for the same email.

properties.name: security-parameters.registration-execution-time
properties.description: Security Parameter: RegistrationsController.createRegistration method execution time.

properties.name: security-parameters.challenge-length
properties.description: Security Parameter: Challenge length (number of bytes).

properties.name: security-parameters.challenge-ttl
properties.description: Security Parameter: Time to live of a challenge before it expires.

properties.name: security-parameters.challenge-execution-time
properties.description: Security Parameter: SessionController.getChallenge method execution time.

properties.name: security-parameters.otp-length
properties.description: Security Parameter: One time password length (number of alphanumeric characters).

properties.name: security-parameters.otp-ttl
properties.description: Security Parameter: Time to live of a One Time Password (OTP) before it expires.

properties.name: security-parameters.otp-execution-time
properties.description: Security Parameter: SessionController.obtainOtp method execution time.

properties.name: security-parameters.login-execution-time
properties.description: Security Parameter: SessionController.login method execution time.

properties.name: security-parameters.signature-algorithm
properties.description: Security Parameter: Signature algorithm.

properties.name: security-parameters.bcrypt-rounds
properties.description: Security Parameter: Bcrypt rounds.

properties.name: i18n.default-language
properties.description: Default language.

properties.name: emails.otp-subject
properties.description: Map of subjects of the OTP email by language.

properties.name: emails.otp-body
properties.description: Map of bodies of the OTP email by language.

properties.name: emails.registration-subject
properties.description: Map of subjects of the registration email by language.

properties.name: emails.registration-body
properties.description: Map of bodies of the registration email by language.

properties.name: emails.already-registered-subject
properties.description: Map of subjects of the already registered email by language.

properties.name: emails.already-registered-body
properties.description: Map of bodies of the already registered email by language.

properties.name: language.defaultLang
properties.description: A description for 'language.defaultLang'
